pageTitle: Deputy Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, March 16, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

1:30 p.m. The Deputy Prime Minister will join ministers and Government of Canada officials to provide an update on coronavirus disease (COVID-19).

National Press Theatre
150 Wellington Street          

Notes for media:

  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:15 p.m.
  • The media availability will also be held by teleconference. Toll-free (Canada/US) dial-in number: 1-866-206-0153 Passcode: 9983428#
